project.name: Candy Wrapper
project.description: A Sinon-like library for spys, stubs, mocks and generally hijacking functions, methods, and attributes.

Wrapper.name: Wrapper
Wrapper.description: Creates a new function wrapper -- a spy, stub, mock, etc.

classitems.description: Wrap all aspects of an object

return.description: Returns an object with all methods and attributes wrapped

classitems.description: Puts a wrapper around a function and returns it

return.description: Returns the a Proxy for a Wrapper around the function

classitems.description:
Resets the wrapper to its default state. Clears out all records of previous calls,
expected behaviors, pass / fail results, etc.

return.description: Returns the Wrapper object so that this call can be chained

classitems.description: helper functions for testing various data types
